roleset.name: worthy of telling
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7.

example.name: arg1
example.text: If the municipal administration were not staffed with government employees , and 12 graduate students work there , then the case would really be newsworthy . We would hotly debate if that is a waste of talents .
example.arg: if the municipal administration were not staffed with government employees and 12 graduate students work there
